blog_title: Why Bluetooth Cat Toys Are Important
blog_post: It's nearly 2023 and you're still giving your cats analog stuffed mice?  Get with the times.  Cats are tired of being insulted with such low tech toys!
I recently tried a new brand of tuna.  Some high-end crap from Sprouts.  Hated it.  #catsrule

With so many products on the market these days it can be daunting trying to navigate the Amazon seas of overseas tech.  Fortunately I've tested the top 10 thermostats with temperature probes on the market so you don't have to.
It's time to shed some light on this fancy new glass that blocks it out.  Is this the beginning of the end for blinds?
